alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 3:22PM CDT until March 30 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Northern Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Cross County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Tipton County in western Tennessee... Northern Shelby County in western Tennessee... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 322 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Marked Tree to Earle, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Millington, Osceola, Marked Tree, Earle, Lepanto, Wilson, Tyronza, Keiser, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Munford, Joiner, Dyess, Gilmore, Bassett, Jericho, Marie, Dixonville, Tipton, Atoka and Turrell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and western Tennessee.
